alert.note: Alert for Sonoma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 22 at 1:11PM PDT until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern California, including the following county, Sonoma. * WHEN...Until 515 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 107 PM PDT, the automated stream gauge at Green Valley Creek at Martinelli Road indicated minor flooding continues. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Forestville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
